CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Subscription Members relative to International Customers?
SRP.A: Subscription Members is {above} International Customers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Budget Shoppers relative to Rural Buyers?
SRP.A: Budget Shoppers is {below} Rural Buyers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Budget Shoppers relative to Urban Shoppers?
SRP.A: Budget Shoppers is {below} Urban Shoppers in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total online sales volume?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Subscription Members}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total online sales volume?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luxury Consumers}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is International Customers's minimum Online Sales Volume in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: International Customers's minimum Online Sales Volume is in {1978}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Rural Buyers's minimum Online Sales Volume in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Rural Buyers's minimum Online Sales Volume is in {1972}.

NC.Q: Was the total Online Sales Volume in 1972 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total online sales volume in 1972 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1983, did the total Online Sales Volume experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total online sales volume between 1979 and 1983 was {smaller} than between 1981 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Online Sales Volume in 1969 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total online sales volume in 1969 was {lower} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, did the total Online Sales Volume experience a larger or smaller change than between 1968 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total online sales volume between 1983 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1968 and 1988.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Subscription Members} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Urban Shoppers and International Customers first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Urban Shoppers and International Customers first exchanged leading positions in {1968}.
